CustomField.description: The annualized amount of Opportunities rolling to this BU, giving preference to ARR. If ARR is 0 or blank, uses MRR*12. Otherwise shows the ARR. Used in Roll-ups to the corresponding Business Unit record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Annual deals only: the full, annualized amount of active revenue for this Customer's agreement.
CustomField.label: Annualized Amount
